collection_holder_name: McKissick Museum, South Carolina Broadcasters Association Archives
pageContext.collection_description: 1970s programming from WLTR-FM, the first station in the South Carolina Educational Radio Network. Zane Knauss, renowned jazz enthusiast, coordinated programming on a wide variety of topics for the University of South Carolina. The collection includes episodes from the following programs: Tell Us About It; The People Who Write; The Playmakers; People, Politics, and Government
pageContext.collection_usage_statement: Contact SCBA Archives staff for reproduction policy.
